Author: elsacouchnaps
Text: Thank you so much for your reply. And I love your perspective on why they may tend to ignore it!

Author: emelinette
Text: I’m so sorry :( I sometimes feel like those close to us can make less of the issue in order to come to terms with it themselves. It’s almost like, if they don’t acknowledge it fully, it’s not really there.   This all sounds so awful. I wish the same for you! My sister once ruined my entire holiday by taunting me about having cut an apple in half and saved half in the fridge for later...
